I'm surprised no one has mentioned Vi.

Reading her little story, she seems perfect.

1) She has a history and could relate to little troublemakers and use her own personal experience to direct their energy in a more positive way.

2) She's not completely "by the books" and could easily be a flexible person to deal with oddball situations. A good mix of knowing when to give a little more leash versus reigning the little tykes in. Sort of a "tough but fair" image.

3) She's intimidating JUST enough to get the point across that you don't do anything blatantly bad while she's around.

4) In a pinch, she would be able to handle any emergencies. Kids accidentily set something off. No worries; she can fix it. Home intruders/kidnappers/etc? Break every bone in their bodies. House fire? Get the kids to safety and could rush back in and rescue those still trapped.

There's surely more but that's all I could come up with in a few minutes.
